name: todoapp
description: tdd without mocking, without external lib support mock & stub

scripts.test: npm run env:test tape app/**/*.unittest.js | tap-spec
scripts.test:db: npm run env:test tape test/*.js tape app/**/*.dbtest.js | tap-spec
scripts.test:cover: NODE_ENV=test PORT=0 istanbul cover tape app/**/*.{unittest,dbtest}.js
scripts.pull: git pull -r && npm i && npm run test
scripts.env:test: NODE_ENV=test PORT=0 DB_UERNAME=todo_test DB_PASSWORD=todo_test DB_NAME=todo_test DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=3306 DB_CONNECTION_LIMIT=1 DEBUG=test

author: hungtd
